112.content: Marge didn't want to change herself drastically, but thought she knew enough to perk herself up. She pulled out her wand and aimed it at her beehive hairdo, "Sky of blue, make me new." POOF! A cloud of smoke went up. Marge coughed and when she recovered, she didn't feel any different. "Maybe it's a timed-release thing," she reasoned, then went about her daily chores. When Maggie woke up an hour later, she eyed Marge carefully. What had changed?
112.title: Revamp herself

The wand looked the same, however the wand had gained an unusual red and unnatural aura around it. Marge was confused by it and picked up the wand. She decided to try and do something simple and change the colour of the fridge however when she tried it nothing happened.
Marge was now annoyed that the wand didn’t work and decided to blame it on poor manufacturing and throw it out, However before she could, the doorbell rang. Marge then lost her train of thought and put the wand back on the table to deal with it later. She shouted “ I’m coming” to the person outside her house and opened the door to see...

choices: Change her clothes and put her into something highly fashionable
11321.content:
Marge then opened her front door and was surprised to see her old (sometimes annoying) friend Helen lovejoy.
“Oh Hello Helen, what brings you here” said Marge irritated by helens surprise visit.
“Hi Marge, you will not believe what that chief Wiggum is doing, oh the disgrace of it, I mean won’t somebody please think of the children”
“Hm hm, would you like to come in for coffee Helen” said Marge not wanting to be rude.
“Oh why thank you Marge sure”.
Both Marge and Helen then walked into the house talking about the horrible thing that chief Clancy Wiggun did and by when they got into the kitchen the while story was already told.
“Oh my god that’s horrible” said Marge
“I know, it just goes to show you what power can do to a weak person like him”.
Helen then sat down at the table, while Marge went to make the coffee.
Helen then noticed the wand on the table and picked up. “What is this some kinda nd of you for the kids” said Helen weirded out by the wand as the red aura of the wand that oddly shifted into this faint yellowish whitish one that was almost angelic in nature.
“What?” Said Marge as she suddenly realised what Helen was talking about and almost jumped in shock. “Oh yeah, one of the kids must of left in on the table” said Marge, Praying that Helen bought his alibi. “Yeah, well whatever what’s going on with you I noticed that you got some new curtains for the kitchen” said Helen slightly odded out by Marge’s reaction to the toy.
“Oh?,Oh yeah we just got them put up today what do you think” asked Marge, trying to drive Helens attention away from the wand.
“Oh there very nice Marge, glad you finally changed something in your life” snickered Helen trying to insult Marge.
“What do you mean by that?” Said Marge annoyed by what Helen just said.
“Well no offence Marge but you’ve hardly changed your style since we met” said Helen hitting Marge with a truth bomb, while fiddling the wand in her hand.
“What’s wrong with my style hmm” said Marge insulted by what Helen had just said (forgetting about the wand).
“Nothing I mean you’ve just never changed it, i mean you’ve had the same hairstyle for the past two years, I swear I just wished you’d at least change your hair into something more stylish” said Helen.
Suddenly the wand started to glow,as Marge remembered about the wand too late.
And within a couple of seconds Marge’s big poofy hair had changed in a puff of smoke into a smaller, slicker and more stylish and fashionable hairstyle similar to the style of Edna Krabappel.
“My Hair!?!” Screamed Marge Simpson in shock as she blushed hard at her new hairdo.
Helen looked on in amazement for a second, as a smirk grew across her face as she realised the power she had.
Marge the saw Helen staring at Marge with her Cheshire Grin realising what she was Planning.
“Helen, Helen please don’t change me anymore, just give me my old hair back and we can pretend this never happened” said Marge in a panic pleading for her style.
“I dunno Marge I love your new hairdo, it makes you look so fashionable and sexy” heckled Helen as Marge only blushed harder because of what she said.
“Please Helen don’t do this to me I’m begging you”
“Sorry Marge but it’s high due time that you get a makeover. Now let’s get you looking nice and pretty” Snickered Helen as she proceeded to point her wand at Marge and...
11321.title: The town gossip Helen lovejoy

113211.content:
Helen pointed the wand at marges regular ensemble of clothing and within a big poof of smoke, it was all changed. Marge tried to keep her eyes closed out of fear off seeing what her outfit had become, however when Marge did open her eyes she was horrified to discover that her plain green dress, had been replaced with a sparkling and glittery tight black mini dress. Not only that but the dress was very tight around the waist and chest and left very little to the imagination. At this moment Marge also realised that she was not wearing her regular plain old white panties and bra, and where instead replaced by a black laced satin pair with a little heart on the front of them which even Marge could see due to how short the dress was. Not only that but Marge realised that she now had tons of silver bangles around her wrists, and that her finger nails were painted red. Also Marge realised that she now was holding a highly fashionable black mini purse that was filled with nothing but make up products. Finally Marge also caught on that her regular earrings and necklace had been replaced, as the pearl necklace now was a choke collar with diamonds on it, and her red earrings were replaced with silver hooped earrings, also Marge realised that her flat red heels had been replaced with a pair of glass platform heels. Needless to say Marge was feeling pretty embarrassed about her new appearance, and Helen was not helping.
“Oh my god Marge, you look so fashionable and sexy now” heckled Helen as she laughed at marges humiliation.
“Fashionable? I look like some sort of hussy, oh please Helen change me back Please I’m begging you, this is soooo humiliating” cried Marge.
However Helen only chuckled at Marge’s pleas for normality.
“Sorry Honey, but no deal I love this new sexy look for you way to much” giggled Helen, making Marge blush harder than she already was. “Now what to change next about your life?” Said Helen considering the cosmic power she held in her hand. Until she snapped her fingers and realised what to do next. “I know I will change your profession, a stay at home housewife is such a boring job, let’s make you do something more exciting” laughed Helen as Marge only sat back in fear scared of how her life was going to change now. Helen then decided that she would turn Marge into............

choices: As if by magic, carrot  cupcakes appeared on Marge's table, already baked
Ned, dressed as a giant rabbit,  knocks on their door, scaring them silly
Marge's recipes mysteriously changed since she last used her cookbooks
123.content: Bart and Lisa came home from school. Bart immediately dropped his bookbag at the door and went for the TV remote. Lisa, being more insightful, went to greet her mother in the kitchen. "Whatcha got there, Mom?" Marge pulled out the next book in the series and handed it to Lisa. "Ooh! A vegetarian cookbook! We can really get creative here!" Then she read on......"Worms: Less Gummy, More Gooey", "Is this some kind of joke?" "They're all like that, Lisa. Just a bit too macabre for my taste, no pun intended." Nevertheless, Marge put them on a shelf with the rest of her cookbooks. She didn't give it another thought until Lisa reminded her of a baking assignment she needed for school. "Okay, I'll get out the cupcake tins and papers, and you can grab our Springfield Church Cookbook." Lisa brought it to the table and began to examine the recipes. "Here's one we can make! How about Carrot Cake?" The lights suddenly flickered in the kitchen. Marge and Lisa looked at each other quizzically. In the back of Marge's mind, she noted, 'Oh no, Lisa's rhyme triggered a spell!' Next........
123.title: Appetizers You Can Find in Your Flowerbed

choices: She held the blade upside down, cutting herself, not the nuts
The knife leaped out of her hands and into the air, on its own power
She threw the knife across the room
1233.content: Lisa scanned the recipe briefly for the list of ingredients. "Mom, do we have all the ingredients to make these?" "Of course, Lisa. I've been baking these for years. I pretty much have the recipe memorized." Lisa admired her mom, always there to provide the best for her family. Marge began setting out the ingredients and Lisa began adding them to a mixing bowl: "Flour, sugar, eggs, crushed pineapple..." she read them off. Then Marge started to grate the carrots. Suddenly she gasped, "Yeeouch!" Blood spurted from Marge's knuckles, into the carrots. "Gee, Mom, are you okay?" Lisa voiced genuine concern. "I think so," Marge replied, turning to the sink to run her hand under cold water. Lisa watched her mother clean the wound and wrap her hand in a dishtowel. "Good thing you were done with the carrots." Marge agreed, "I wouldn't have wanted to use that grater again." Lisa gathered the shredded carrots up and stirred them into the cupcake batter. "...And chopped walnuts is all that's left to add. Do you want me to handle those, Mom?" "I think I can manage some nuts," Marge giggled. Lisa caught onto the pun and laughed herself. She got the walnuts out and Marge grabbed the cutting board and knife she would be using. Then out of the blue, Marge did something weird.....
1233.title: Marge's recipes mysteriously changed since ...

choices: Marge confesses to Lisa about her magic class involvement.
Lisa tries to drive Marge to the hospital.
12331.content: Talking to Lisa as she worked, Marge spread the walnuts onto the board and attempted to chop them. Then Lisa turned sheet-white when she saw what her mother was doing. Lisa quickly diverted Marge's attention so that she was forced to look away, then when she turned back around, she screamed at what she saw. Marge had used the knife blade to cut into her hands, instead of the nuts, which remained whole. Every one of Marge's fingers on her right hand was severed and blood was more visible than skin. Lisa rushed to grab the phone and called 911, while Marge calmly sunk into a chair, seemingly unscathed......

132.content: Marge groaned as the lights flickered. "That Lisa and her experiments. One of these days she's gonna turn her brother into a frog." An image of Bart "ribbeting" entered her head. Marge shook it and started glancing through the book. Only the sound of Maggie's giggles shook her from her reading. Marge's eyes widened like saucers as her baby daughter sailed around the room above her. "Maggie! You come down from there this instant!" Marge attempted to grasp her every time the infant flew past. Finally she was able to grab onto the "toy" wand and that halted the blanket. Maggie dropped into Marge's arms, still giggling and holding her pacifier. "How in the world did you do that, Maggie?" The baby just shrugged her shoulders and popped her paci back into her mouth. Marge slipped the wand in between the pages of the book, then wrapped Maggie in the blanket and brought her upstairs. She didn't notice that the wand suddenly rolled out of the book, falling off the table and onto the floor......

'They must've gotten me a new fetching stick,' the dog thought to himself. It certainly didn't look like a bone or rawhide chew. Taking it gingerly into his mouth, SLH brought it into the living room, and laid down beside Bart. "Hey, boy, whatcha got there?" the boy inquired. The dog wasn't entirely sure what it was himself. He eagerly accepted the pats on his head as he settled in to watch television with Bart......

Another breed of dog (of either gender)
132121.content: The plastic wand was bland and tasteless in the dog's mouth. He eventually spit it out, but kept it under his paws. It still had play potential, so he wasn't about to abandon it just yet. His master was deeply engrossed in the "Itchy and Scratchy" cartoon, when it suddenly paused for a commercial message. Bart leapt from the couch to get a snack from the kitchen, being admonished by Marge to not spoil his appetite for dinner. "Remember, this is pork chop night," reminded Marge. "I know, Mom. I just got thirsty." Bart grabbed a cold soda pop from the refrigerator. Back in the living room, Santa's Little Helper was watching an ad for a local dog park, which was opening soon. Lush trees and abundant greenery filled the screen, and the Simpson's hound couldn't help but wag his tail and pant. "Bring your best friend to 'FURRY MEADOWS DOG PARK!" the announcement proclaimed. Santa's Little Helper knew who his best friend was. That part was easy enough, but capturing Bart's attention was another matter. He knew the boy loved him, but diverting his attention away from the latest "Radioactive Man" comic book or a video game was seldom easy. If only Bart understood what it was like to be a dog, he might more often spend time with the family pet. Santa's Little Helper sighed audibly and didn't notice the magic wand crackling to life. A small poof emitted and the dog's unspoken wish was granted! Bart Simpson had been transformed into a........
132121.title: Bart

info.brief_description: Marge Simpson discovers the wonderful world of magic and all of its possible uses
info.description:
The Simpsons enter the world of magic, as controlled by their mother. Marge, a budding student, is new to this and decides to conduct her family's affairs with a new dimension.

NO SEX OR VORE, NO SEXUAL SITUATIONS!!
Keep it 13+ clean. Other bodily functions are fine.
